name: scrollbars
description:
Easily add accurate horizontal and vertical scrollbars to frames. Works regardless of Auto-Layout settings and calculates all sizing automatically :^)


Simply select a frame with children and run the plugin. If a scrollbar is needed on either axis, it will be added to your frame. If your content changes, re-run the plugin on your frame (optionally via a shortcut in the properties panel) and the scrollbars will adjust accordingly.


In the future, if requested, I would consider adding a control panel for editing the size/styling of the generated scrollbar and changing initial offsets.


Enjoy!
